name: Basic Kitsune Base
description:
Free to use, or you can leave me a little tip!

Comes with two base versions, with one tail and with two tails, as well as basic shading, and some small markings.

A premium version of this base is currently being worked on. The premium base will include a lot more markings and variations, as well as clothes and accessories.

RULES:

✔️ You may make adopts to sell. 
✔️ You may make as many as you want.
✔️ You may make edits to the lineart.
✔️ You must credit me for any and all uses of this base.
✔️ You may post adopts outside of DA. (But you still have to credit me, obviously.)
❌ You may not redistribute or resell the base.

You need to have an editing program that can open PSD files, such as Photoshop or Paint Tool SAI in order to properly edit this base.
